mapper.sql: SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ENABLE, t11.MEMO, t11.OWNERID, t11.OWNERTYPE, t11.SUBTYPE, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t11.USERDATA, t11.USERDATA2, t1.USERGROUPID, t1.USERGROUPNAME, t11.USEROBJECTLEVEL, t11.USEROBJECTTYPE FROM T_SRFUSERGROUP t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSEROBJECT t11 ON t1.USERGROUPID = t11.USEROBJECTID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1

SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ENABLE`, t11.`MEMO`, t11.`OWNERID`, t11.`OWNERTYPE`, t11.`SUBTYPE`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t11.`USERDATA`, t11.`USERDATA2`, t1.`USERGROUPID`, t1.`USERGROUPNAME`, t11.`USEROBJECTLEVEL`, t11.`USEROBJECTTYPE` FROM `T_USERGROUP` t1 LEFT JOIN T_USEROBJECT t11 ON t1.USERGROUPID = t11.USEROBJECTID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ENABLE, t11.MEMO, t11.OWNERID, t11.OWNERTYPE, t11.SUBTYPE, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t11.USERDATA, t11.USERDATA2, t1.USERGROUPID, t1.USERGROUPNAME, t11.USEROBJECTLEVEL, t11.USEROBJECTTYPE FROM T_USERGROUP t1 LEFT JOIN T_USEROBJECT t11 ON t1.USERGROUPID = t11.USEROBJECTID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.ENABLE AS ENABLE, t11.MEMO AS MEMO, t11.OWNERID AS OWNERID, t11.OWNERTYPE AS OWNERTYPE, t11.SUBTYPE AS SUBTYPE, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN, t11.USERDATA AS USERDATA, t11.USERDATA2 AS USERDATA2, t1.USERGROUPID AS USERGROUPID, t1.USERGROUPNAME AS USERGROUPNAME, t11.USEROBJECTLEVEL AS USEROBJECTLEVEL, t11.USEROBJECTTYPE AS USEROBJECTTYPE FROM T_SRFUSERGROUP t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSEROBJECT t11 ON t1.USERGROUPID = t11.USEROBJECTID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.ENABLE AS ENABLE, t11.MEMO AS MEMO, t11.OWNERID AS OWNERID, t11.OWNERTYPE AS OWNERTYPE, t11.SUBTYPE AS SUBTYPE, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN, t11.USERDATA AS USERDATA, t11.USERDATA2 AS USERDATA2, t1.USERGROUPID AS USERGROUPID, t1.USERGROUPNAME AS USERGROUPNAME, t11.USEROBJECTLEVEL AS USEROBJECTLEVEL, t11.USEROBJECTTYPE AS USEROBJECTTYPE FROM T_SRFUSERGROUP t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSEROBJECT t11 ON t1.USERGROUPID = t11.USEROBJECTID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1

SELECT t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t1.[ENABLE], t11.[MEMO], t11.[OWNERID], t11.[OWNERTYPE], t11.[SUBTYPE], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN], t11.[USERDATA], t11.[USERDATA2], t1.[USERGROUPID], t1.[USERGROUPNAME], t11.[USEROBJECTLEVEL], t11.[USEROBJECTTYPE] FROM [T_SRFUSERGROUP] t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSEROBJECT t11 ON t1.USERGROUPID = t11.USEROBJECTID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1
